response.original_title: Searching For A World That Doesn't Exist
response.overview: "At the crossroads, don't turn left" is the first line of a book that Avery did not write. A strange mine suddenly appears in Avery's world with an odd book in a chest, but as he explores further, Avery finds a tunnel leading to a Minecraft world that shouldn't exist. And he isn't the only thing in this world either...
response.title: Searching For A World That Doesn't Exist
